metadata.title: CVE-2023-34321 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Arm provides multiple helpers to clean & invalidate the cache for a givenregion. This is, for instance, used when allocating guest memory to ensureany writes (such as the ones during scrubbing) have reached memory beforehanding over the page to a guest. Unfortunately, the arithmetics in thehelpers can overflow and would then result to skip the cachecleaning/invalidation. Therefore there is no guarantee when all the writeswill reach the memory.

criterions.comment: xen package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
